messages.subject: Re: iPhone apps for a 3 year old
messages.msgSnippet: I have a 3 and a 4 year old (boys). Popular in our house: Peppa Pig (really very good app) Dora the Explorer (rainbow ride- good for colour I think) Monkey
messages.messageBody:
I have a 3 and a 4 year old (boys). Popular in our house:

Peppa Pig (really very good app)
Dora the Explorer (rainbow ride- good for colour I think)
Monkey Lunch Box
When I Grow Up (dressing up game)
Fairy Trails- very clever- uses the camera so you can hunt fairies and butterflies in your own living room
Angry Birds, Cut the Rope, World of Goo etc are popular and good for playing together.

He may like the Big Green Rabbit songs on youTube: search for 'Green Anaconda Song', 'Spider Monkey Song' and you'll be led to others. Mine also love the dinosaur song, one thousand steps, umbrella bird and the iguana song.

--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "Messyfish" <messy_fish@...> wrote:
>
> I would love to help my 3 year old find some apps for my iPhone. He loves loves loves colour. Also loves animals and bold cartoon style graphics. He is currently navigating the phone and finding you tube videos he likes. Richard Scary is his favourite.
> Kind regards
> Anna
>

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] iPhone apps for a 3 year old
messages.msgSnippet: Zoe is 4.5 and here is a list of her favorites: Angry Birds DressChica Chirp Chirp Coloring Book FingerPaint Hallmark Jingle (there are several free stories
messages.messageBody:
Zoe is 4.5 and here is a list of her favorites:

Angry Birds
DressChica
Chirp Chirp
Coloring Book
FingerPaint
Hallmark Jingle (there are several free stories that are cute)
Shapes Lite
ColorFill
Metrium Paint
DoodleBuddy
Pretty Particles
Fluid FX
Sculptor
Live Sketch
weeGiggle
Cupcake Maker
MixMeFixMe


The "genius" option at the App Store has been very helpful in finding new
games.

Gwen

messages.subject: iPhone apps for a 3 year old
messages.msgSnippet: I would love to help my 3 year old find some apps for my iPhone. He loves loves loves colour. Also loves animals and bold cartoon style graphics. He is
messages.messageBody:
I would love to help my 3 year old find some apps for my iPhone. He loves loves loves colour. Also loves animals and bold cartoon style graphics. He is currently navigating the phone and finding you tube videos he likes. Richard Scary is his favourite.
Kind regards
Anna
